New Records: New Zealand has won all five World Cup matches against Bangladesh since 1999 and all nine ODIs between February 13, 2019, and September 26, 2023.
Key Match Events: The Chepauk pitch is spin-friendly, which could play a key role in the match.
Pre-Game Insights: New Zealand will rely on their spin attack to counter Bangladesh's spinners, and Bangladesh will look for their first win after losing to England.
Miscellaneous Highlights: New Zealand's strong record against Bangladesh in the World Cup and the spin-friendly pitch are significant factors.
